Text: Daphne, a mother whose love knows no boundaries or borders. Has grown as a single mother to three wonderful girls, the clumsy but adorable Milly, the sensible psychologist Maggiey the sensual and irreverent Mae - to become the kind of women any mom would kill to have. In order to prevent the youngest, Milly, make the same mistakes sentimental in which she did, Daphne decides to match it with the perfect man. Without saying anything to Milly puts an ad in a contact page on the Internet to find it. If anyone knows exactly what your child needs and what does not need a long term relationship, this is Daphne ... or at least that's what she thinks! Maybe Milly disagrees.
